languages.text: "Неподалеку есть секретный лифт, ведущий в мои покои. Я видел{mf||а}, как им пользовалась Леди Теодора. Может, и преступник знал о нем?"

traits.locale_text: "Неподалеку есть секретный лифт, ведущий в мои покои. Я видел{mf||а}, как им пользовалась Леди Теодора. Может, и преступник знал о нем?"

languages.text: "There is a secret lift nearby leading to my chambers. I saw Lady Theodora use it. Could the culprit also have known of its existence?"
languages.original_text: "Неподалеку есть секретный лифт, ведущий в мои покои. Я видел{mf||а}, как им пользовалась Леди Теодора. Может, и преступник знал о нем?"

traits.locale_text: "There is a secret lift nearby leading to my chambers. I saw Lady Theodora use it. Could the culprit also have known of its existence?"
"There is a secret lift nearby leading to my chambers. I saw Lady Theodora use it. Could the culprit also have known of its existence?"
"There is a secret lift nearby leading to my chambers. I saw Lady Theodora use it. Could the culprit also have known of its existence?"
"There is a secret lift nearby leading to my chambers. I saw Lady Theodora use it. Could the culprit also have known of its existence?"
"There is a secret lift nearby leading to my chambers. I saw Lady Theodora use it. Could the culprit also have known of its existence?"

languages.text: “这附近有一部秘密电梯，可以直接通往我的房间，我曾见过西奥多拉夫人使用它。莫非那个犯人也知道它的存在吗？”
languages.original_text: "There is a secret lift nearby leading to my chambers. I saw Lady Theodora use it. Could the culprit also have known of its existence?"

traits.locale_text: “这附近有一部秘密电梯，可以直接通往我的房间，我曾见过西奥多拉夫人使用它。莫非那个犯人也知道它的存在吗？”

languages.text: «Cerca de aquí hay un ascensor secreto que lleva a mis aposentos. Vi a lady Theodora usarlo. ¿Y si el responsable conocía también su existencia?».
languages.original_text: "There is a secret lift nearby leading to my chambers. I saw Lady Theodora use it. Could the culprit also have known of its existence?"

traits.locale_text: «Cerca de aquí hay un ascensor secreto que lleva a mis aposentos. Vi a lady Theodora usarlo. ¿Y si el responsable conocía también su existencia?».

languages.text: 「私の部屋に通じる秘密のエレベーターが近くにあります。シオドーラ様が使っているのを見ました。犯人もその存在を知っていたのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "There is a secret lift nearby leading to my chambers. I saw Lady Theodora use it. Could the culprit also have known of its existence?"

traits.locale_text: 「私の部屋に通じる秘密のエレベーターが近くにあります。シオドーラ様が使っているのを見ました。犯人もその存在を知っていたのでしょうか？」

languages.text: "Es gibt nicht weit von hier einen geheimen Aufzug in meine Gemächer. Ich sah, wie ihn Lady Theodora benutzt hat. Könnte der Täter auch von seiner Existenz gewusst haben?"
languages.original_text: "There is a secret lift nearby leading to my chambers. I saw Lady Theodora use it. Could the culprit also have known of its existence?"

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt nicht weit von hier einen geheimen Aufzug in meine Gemächer. Ich sah, wie ihn Lady Theodora benutzt hat. Könnte der Täter auch von seiner Existenz gewusst haben?"

languages.text: « Il y a dans le secteur un monte-charge secret menant à mes quartiers. J'ai vu dame Théodora s'en servir. Le coupable aurait-il pu lui aussi être au courant de son existence ? »
languages.original_text: "There is a secret lift nearby leading to my chambers. I saw Lady Theodora use it. Could the culprit also have known of its existence?"

traits.locale_text: « Il y a dans le secteur un monte-charge secret menant à mes quartiers. J'ai vu dame Théodora s'en servir. Le coupable aurait-il pu lui aussi être au courant de son existence ? »

languages.text: "Yakınlarda odama çıkan gizli bir asansör var. Leydi Theodora'nın onu kullandığını görmüştüm. Suçlu da bu asansörün varlığından haberdar olabilir mi?"
languages.original_text: "There is a secret lift nearby leading to my chambers. I saw Lady Theodora use it. Could the culprit also have known of its existence?"
